title: What is the most beautiful song sung by Elton John? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my opinion, ‘The Greatest Discovery’ is truly magnificent. This song is about a young child being introduced to their new baby brother. It doesn’t have a chorus, or a middle 8, or even proper verses. It’s like a poem in song and it’s really beautiful. If you’re looking for one from the parade of hits, you can’t go wrong with Your Song or Border Song. Very beautiful in their own right, but not my personal favourite.

“We All Fall In Love Sometimes/Curtains” from Captain Fantastic and the Brown Dirt Cowboy gets my vote. A beautiful song initially inspired by their writing of “Your Song,” this combines brilliantly moving lyrics with poignant melodies … here you go, and enjoy.
